channel.title: data science on Corentin LEGER
channel.description: Recent content in data science on Corentin LEGER

item.title: Depression classifier
item.description: A data science project that aims to identify if a person on a picture is depressed or happy. In order to do so, a data pipeline has been created and the learning has been made thanks to a convolutionnal neural network. Link to Github repository

item.title: Spaceship Titanic
item.description: A data science kaggle project wich aims to discover who was in the ‘Spaceship Titanic’. Link to the Github Repository

item.title: Maintenance optimization for an helicopter fleet
item.description: This is my first internship in data science for Connectiv-IT. My mission was to work on the optimization of the maintenance of an aircraft fleet. I realized several data science tasks such as data processing and visualization, but also statistical analysis and clustering thanks to unsupervised learning. Two models of outlier detection and missing value simulation were also created, as well as a theoretical linear programming optimization model.

item.title: Weather predict
item.description: A simple data science project to predicyt weather thanks to historical data, using the neuralProphet librairy Link to Github repository

item.title: Canadian Elections
item.description: This is the first big data (and data science) project I ever made, during my scholarship in Canada. The goal of this project is to predict the vote of canadian citizens during the 2019 election, thanks to responses to a survey. Despite the fact that we were beginners in this field,we managed with my classmate to predict about 80% of those votes right. Link to Github repository
